April 10, 1950 D East Anglian BBA Class A
East Anglian BBA Spring Festival (Class A) 20 Entertainments Contest East Anglian BBA Spring Festival east-anglian-bba-class-a
Test Piece Contest
Moses in Egypt [arr. Greenwood]
St. Andrew's Hall, Norwich Hymn tune contest in conjunction with all other sections - 1st King's Lynn, 2nd Drayton, 3rd Soham Comrades. 5 bands competed.
Feb. 19, 2014, 10:56 a.m. July 1, 2016, 6:56 a.m.

2 March Brass 2000 L. Cox
3 Norfolk Brass Ensemble Tom Atkinson
